meanings.meaning: 1. medium (size); average (grade, level, etc.); middle
2. in; within; out of (e.g. ten people); among 空気中のごく小さい粒子がガンのもとになり得る。Tiny particles in the air can cause cancer.
3. during; while; in (the course of); within (a period); throughout 彼は旅行中に病気になった。He got sick during the trip.
4. currently (doing); in the process of; in the middle of; under (e.g. construction, investigation) 隣の部屋では会議中です。There is a conference going on in the next room.
5. middle way; moderation
6. second volume (of three) See also 上, See also 下
7. junior high school; middle school Abbreviation, See also 中学校
8. China Abbreviation, See also 中国
1. inside; interior 彼は自分のお金を全部箱の中に入れた。He put all his money in the box.
2. among; within これらの商品の中から１つ選びなさい。Choose one from among these products.
3. middle; center; centre
4. during; while; middle; midst; amid 身を切るような寒い中でわざわざ遊ばなくてもいいじゃない。You don't have to play outside in the biting wind.
5. interval; gap
6. mean; average

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 7. second (of three, e.g. sons, volumes); middle

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 8. medium grade; medium quality
9. red-light district Archaic
10. Naka
1. (all) through (e.g. the night); throughout (e.g. the year); all ... long 彼は夏中ずっと長野にいた。He stayed in Nagano throughout the summer.
2. within (e.g. the week); in the course of (e.g. today); by the end of as 〜に最終提案は来週中に発表されます。The final proposal will be announced sometime next week.
3. all over; throughout (e.g. the world) その知らせは村中に不安をまき起こした。The news caused alarm throughout the village.
4. all (of a group); the whole (family, school, etc.) その事件は学校中にショックを与えた。The incident gave a shock to the whole school.
中 【ぢゅう】
1. red dragon tile Mahjong, Abbreviation, See also 紅中
2. winning hand with a pung (or kong) of red dragon tiles Mahjong

sentences.translation: Tiny particles in the air can cause cancer.
He got sick during the trip.
There is a conference going on in the next room.

meanings.meaning: 1. inside; within エイズが私が生きているうちに治ることを願っているよ。I have a dream that AIDS will be cured in my lifetime.
2. while (e.g. one is young); during; within (e.g. a day); in the course of Usually written using kana aloneあの少年は店から店を歩いているうちに盗み癖がでてしまった。The young boy got sticky fingers when he walked into stores.
3. among; amongst; (out) of; between Usually written using kana alone, as 〜のうち私の息子二人のうち、一人は教師で、もう一人は医者です。One of my sons is a teacher, and the other is a doctor.

4. in (secret, chaos, poverty, etc.); amidst; with (e.g. success) Usually written using kana alone, also 裡, 裏; as 〜のうちに after a noun representing a state or condition「うちで働いてみたいかね」とウッドさんが尋ねました。"Would you like to work for me, Tony?" asked Mr Wood.
5. within oneself; one's feelings; inner thoughts
6. we; our company; our organization Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 内, Antonym: そと, Antonym: よそうちの一番腕利きの交渉者はいつも強引に有利な取り引きをする。Our best negotiators always drive a hard bargain.
7. one's home; one's family Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 内, See also 家 うち, also 家
8. my spouse; my husband; my wife Only applies to 内
9. signed on behalf of (husband's name) by his wife Only applies to 内, in a letter after the husband's name
10. I; me Usually written using kana alone, Kansai dialect, Only applies to 内, primarily used by women and children
11. imperial palace grounds Archaic, Only applies to 内
12. emperor Archaic, Only applies to 内
中 【うち】

sentences.translation: I have a dream that AIDS will be cured in my lifetime.
The young boy got sticky fingers when he walked into stores.
One of my sons is a teacher, and the other is a doctor.
"Would you like to work for me, Tony?" asked Mr Wood.
Our best negotiators always drive a hard bargain.

1. interruption; discontinuance; suspension; stoppage 暴風雨のため道路工事が中止された。Work on the road was suspended because of the storm.

1. interruption; discontinuance; suspension; stoppage 暴風雨のため道路工事が中止された。Work on the road was suspended because of the storm.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. middle; halfway; midway 彼女は４０代半ばで再婚した。She married again in her mid-forties.
2. half (of); one half 人生とは何であるかを知ったとき、すでに生涯の半ばは過ぎている。Life is half spent before we know what it is.
3. half (e.g. done, jokingly); partly; in part; partially 出だしがよければ半ばやり遂げたようなものだ。Well begun is half done.
4. mostly; almost; nearly
中ば 【なかば】
中ば: Irregular kanji usage.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to be hit; to strike Antonym: 外す彼は発砲したが当たらなかった。He fired but missed.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to touch; to be in contact; to be affixed

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be equivalent to; to be applicable; to apply to 日本の桜はまさにイギリスのバラにあたる。The cherry blossom is to Japan what the rose is to England.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to be right on the money (of a prediction, criticism, etc.) 不思議な話だが、彼の予言は当たった。Strange to say, his prediction has come true.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to be selected (in a lottery, etc.); to win 福引きでカメラが当たった。I got a camera in a lottery.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to be successful; to go well; to be a hit

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to face; to confront

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to lie (in the direction of)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to undertake; to be assigned

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to be stricken (by food poisoning, heat, etc.); to be afflicted 彼はフグにあたった。He was poisoned by the globefish he ate.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to be called on (e.g. by a teacher)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to treat (esp. harshly); to lash out at

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to be unnecessary as 〜するには当たらない, etc.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to be hitting well; to be on a hitting streak Baseball, usu. as 当たっている

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to feel a bite (in fishing)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. (of fruit, etc.) to be bruised; to spoil

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to feel (something) out; to probe into; to check (i.e. by comparison)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 18. to shave

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 19. to be a relative of a person; to be a ... in relation to ...; to stand in a relationship as 〜の〜に当たる
当る 【あたる】、中る 【あたる】、中たる 【あたる】

sentences.translation: He fired but missed.
The cherry blossom is to Japan what the rose is to England.
Strange to say, his prediction has come true.

He was poisoned by the globefish he ate.

meanings.meaning: 1. very; considerably; easily; readily; fairly; quite; highly; rather Usually written using kana aloneあいつは、なかなかいい奴だぜ！He is a good joker.
